text: Agdistis flavissima is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from China (Xinjiang) and Turkmenistan.A taxonomic study of the genus Agdistis Hubner, [1825] 1816 from China, with description of one new species (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths described in 1920
title: Agdistis flavissima
